main event: A witness observed a white, cigar-shaped object moving very fast in a straight line over Miamisburg, Ohio, on August 23, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a regular cigar and turned upwards like a meteor., The object was dull in color and blended with the night sky, making it hard to spot., It was observed for 1/3 to 1 second and moved very quickly., Another witness experienced a bright light illuminating the yard around their house for about 5-10 minutes but could not locate the source., A sketch drawn by the witness depicted an oval shape with a vapor trail.
witness description: one civilian witness and another named Mrs. Margaret Duo
